structure.unit: ARTICLE XLIII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON IMMIGRATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-404. Membership.
The Committee shall be co-chaired by Commissioners Barbara M. Carey, Jorge E. Valdes, and Harvey Ruvin. The members of the committee shall be Mrs. Roxcy Bolton, T. Willard Fair, Rep. Dante Fascell or designee, Mrs. Toni Gary, Dr. Michael Krop, Mayor Raul Martinez, Mrs. M. Athalie Range, Hon. Abe Resnick, Perry Rivkind, Hon. Harvey Ruvin, Dr. Artistides A. Sosa, Msgr. Bryan Walsh, Father Tom Wenski and Hon. Gerald T. Wetherington. Staff members of the Committee shall be the County Manager and the County Attorney, or their designees. Each member shall serve for a term of four (4) years. The Board of County Commissioners may, by motion, appoint additional or successor members and may remove members with or without cause at any time.
